title: Being banned for shutting down a failed game load
body:
Yes I know if you leave games again and again you will be banned and there are those who do that.
But in my case after picks and bans phase, it doesn't load anything there after so i have to try the ways watch all need the game 
client to be shut down thus making this the 2nd time being banned due to this reason.
I think to minimize so that these occurrences that some form of tracking of actual in game progress like damaged issued etc is needed
so cases like mine are not turning players from this game as at times due to this loading problem i stop playing league and switch to something
that is working properly for me.
I would welcome those this has happened to back my claim up of how this does happen to those who just wanna play this game as its meant to be played and not be punished for things that wasn't our fault in the first place.

replies.body: i think its bull that your game crashes you try over and over again and to fix it you need to log out but no they fing ban you for a in game suppesion
By any chance did you use Google Translate to post this message? Because I cannot understand it.
No i just have terrible grammar and dont tend to re-read over things
Nevertheless, I still don't understand what that post was about. Are you having issues with your client constantly crashing, or is it that you're being disconnected from games?
